name: BBS News
description:
Made within 8 hours for (and 3rd place winner of) GameCraft 2017- https://www.gamecraft.it/

The theme was fake news.

Only report on the stories your beneficiaries want. If they don't agree with a story, feel free to subtly modify it.

Left, right, up, down to shoot.

Shoot green stories to make them red.

Don't shoot red stories.

Click to move on where applicable.

Complete the game and it will start again, but harder.
